description: Added curl commands directly to Cursor RULE.md files (not just .docflow/rules)

fixes.description: Root cause fix: Cursor only loads .cursor/rules/*/RULE.md files, not .docflow/rules/*.md. Added MCP limitation warnings and actual curl commands directly into the Cursor rule files that get auto-loaded.

upgrade_notes: docflow-core/RULE.md (alwaysApply: true) now contains curl commands inline
Agent will see MCP limitations immediately on every conversation
No need to read .docflow/rules/ files for critical API commands
